name: Dammit Robit
description:
This is a terminal-based game where you connect to a rude robot given the imaginative name of Robit. Your connection to it allows you to send simple commands to control it to hopefully save you - not that it really wants to, however.

This is my entry for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4 (Theme:Connect), so there's the smallest of chances a bug or ten could've been missed in my hurry to finish on time.
